    public abstract class BaseRestHandler
extends AbstractComponent
implements RestHandler
    Base handler for REST requests.

    This handler makes sure that the headers & context of the handled requests are copied over to the transport requests executed by the associated client. While the context is fully copied over, not all the headers are copied, but a selected few. It is possible to control what headers are copied over by registering them using RestController.registerRelevantHeaders(String...)
